channel.title: 类编译 on 郑欢的学习总结
channel.description: Recent content in 类编译 on 郑欢的学习总结

item.title: dex2oat
item.description: pre-compilation的好处 Code pre-compilation: We pre-compile all the hot code. When the apps execute, the most important parts of the code are already optimized and ready to be natively executed. The app no longer needs to wait for the JIT compiler to kick in. The benefit is that the code is mapped as clean memory (compared to the JIT dirty memory) which improves the overall memory efficiency. The clean memory can be released by the kernel when under memory pressure while the dirty memory cannot, lessening the chances that the kernel will kill the app.
